ai-tika-abh08t43:30_12: For he has the influence of name and form, and the truth of suffering, origin, cessation, and the path. He has attained the truth of the origin of suffering. His practice in the way that is the noble truth of the path and the penetration of the path. He sees the truth of the impermanence of suffering in him, his attention, and he has reached the peaking of the worst kindness with a stream-enterer. And it was still not leveld to direct knowledge the development of the four noble ones, and he saw the noble truths that it was soon as its condition.
ai-tika-abh08t43:30_13: So when it is said: ‘This is a great knowledge of the incomparable, this is so very beneficial,
ai-tika-abh08t43:30_14: Hence it is said: “There is no need,”
ai-tika-abh08t43:31_0: Thus in conformity with the Dhamma—
ai-tika-abh08t43:33_0: The purification of doubt is finished.
